properties.displayName: Command Line Execution with Suspicious URL and AppData Strings
properties.query:
DeviceProcessEvents
| where (ProcessCommandLine contains "http" and ProcessCommandLine contains "://" and ProcessCommandLine contains "%AppData%") and FolderPath endswith "\\cmd.exe"

tags.name: description
tags.value: Detects a suspicious command line execution that includes an URL and AppData string in the command line parameters as used by several droppers (js/vbs > powershe
